item.title: Comment on The Chauffeur [EP] by Sam Bonilla
item.dc:creator: Sam Bonilla

item.title: Comment on Labyrinthine Heart by Sam Bonilla
item.dc:creator: Sam Bonilla
item.description: I absolutely Love this record, Masterpiece!

item.title: Comment on The Dawnseeker by Sam Bonilla
item.dc:creator: Sam Bonilla
item.description: One of the most beautiful records i have ever heard, such a shame it is not available in my country in physical format, beautiful voices, beautiful music. Majestic!
item.content:encoded: One of the most beautiful records i have ever heard, such a shame it is not available in my country in physical format, beautiful voices, beautiful music. Majestic!

item.title: Comment on Mortal Longing by Dolores Kawalec
item.dc:creator: Dolores Kawalec
item.description: This song speaks directly to my soul. I love the magickal quality and passion of it, feels as though it was produced by a higher power.
item.content:encoded: This song speaks directly to my soul. I love the magickal quality and passion of it, feels as though it was produced by a higher power.

item.title: Comment on The Dawnseeker by Jesse Blevins
item.dc:creator: Jesse Blevins
item.description: This album is amazing. The music is so haunting. I simply LOVE Sublunar. Kristy Thirsk has such an angelic voice. I really hope to hear more soon!
item.content:encoded: This album is amazing. The music is so haunting. I simply LOVE Sublunar. Kristy Thirsk has such an angelic voice. I really hope to hear more soon!

item.title: Comment on Invitation (Sleepthief Remix) by Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael
item.description: the above pic). Lazy Rich has been killing it with the rxieems lately (see this wobbly track here). This remix in particular just refuses to stop. Get the party started
item.content:encoded: the above pic). Lazy Rich has been killing it with the rxieems lately (see this wobbly track here). This remix in particular just refuses to stop. Get the party started

item.title: Comment on Mortal Longing by Jessica Belle
item.dc:creator: Jessica Belle
item.description: Jody Quine has one of the most amazing voices I have ever heard, and when I heard this song from Sleepthief, I had to have it. This song will be a welcome addition to my collection.
item.content:encoded: Jody Quine has one of the most amazing voices I have ever heard, and when I heard this song from Sleepthief, I had to have it. This song will be a welcome addition to my collection.

item.title: Comment on Labyrinthine Heart by Rachel Coburn
item.dc:creator: Rachel Coburn
item.description: Yet again your music is on a constant loop in my house. I simply cannot go a week without listening to both your albums Justin. I have converted my eldest son who listens to metal. Only asked the other day if there was any more. If you like Delerium your going to love Sleepthief. More modern but still hauntingly intriguing ! Buy it !!
item.content:encoded: Yet again your music is on a constant loop in my house. I simply cannot go a week without listening to both your albums Justin. I have converted my eldest son who listens to metal. Only asked the other day if there was any more. If you like Delerium your going to love Sleepthief. More modern but still hauntingly intriguing ! Buy it !!

item.title: Comment on Snow by Rachel Coburn
item.dc:creator: Rachel Coburn
item.description: A beautiful rendition on Loreena Mckennit's version. Zoe was the perfect choice for this haunting track ! Well done.
item.content:encoded: A beautiful rendition on Loreena Mckennit’s version. Zoe was the perfect choice for this haunting track ! Well done.

item.title: Comment on O Come, O Come Emmanuel by Oceano
item.dc:creator: Oceano
